divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking outside my window and i found a black triangle it had a red light in the middle there were 6 lights that were white.My mom was asleep i was so scared it came down to the lowest wire we have then it went back up to the sky.It was moving oddly this is how it was moving left left right right down down down down up up up up and when it left it left a trail of white puffy smoke that was in a shape of a triangle.
